books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.description: A novel about the American dream and the roaring twenties, following the mysterious Jay Gatsby.

books.author: George Orwell
books.description: A dystopian novel that explores totalitarianism, surveillance, and individuality.

books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.description: A powerful story of racial injustice and childhood in the American South.

books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.author: Jane Austen
books.description: A classic romantic novel that critiques societal expectations and marriage.

books.title: The Hobbit
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.description: A fantasy adventure of Bilbo Baggins, a hobbit who joins a quest to reclaim a lost kingdom.
